org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic

Class LCNUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.LCNUtil

  • public class LCNUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements some helpful methods to handle certain aspects of the LCNBinding.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek

    • Method Detail

      • printModule

        public static void printModule(LCNInputModule mod,
               boolean extended)
        Prints the LCNInputModule information on the screen. Additional information for binary states can be printed as well.
        Parameters:
        mod - The LCNInputModule in question.
        extended - True if additional information shall be printed.

      • printModule

        public static void printModule(LCNInputModule mod)
        Prints the LCNInputModule information on the screen.
        Parameters:
        mod - The LCNInputModule in question.

      • compareHexDate

        public static int compareHexDate(java.lang.String date,
                 java.lang.String date2)
        Compares to dates in hex form.
        Parameters:
        date - The first date which is compared.
        date2 - The Second date which is the base.
        Returns:
        int: '<0' = date1 is earlier; 0 = equal; '>0' = date1 is later

      • equalsAny

        public static <T> boolean equalsAny(T original,
                    java.util.List<T> others)
        Compares an Object to a whole list of objects. If any of them equals the original, true is returned.
        Parameters:
        original - The original object.
        others - A list of objects for comparison.
        Returns:
        True if any object of the list equals the original, false otherwise.
